name: Neel Power
tag_list: , power--control-relays, power-capacitors, power-control-centers, power-distribution-transformers, protection-relays, power-factor-controllers, servo-controlled-voltage-stabilizer, servo-voltage-stabilizer-
overview:
Neelkanth Mumbai - Manufacturer of Voltage Stabilizer.

NEEL, since inception in 1979, has concentrated in the field of identifying Power Quality disturbances & offering Techno Economic Solutions for the past three decades.

Neelkanth is established by Mr. Hemant Mehta founder partner of Neel Group of Companies. We have accumulated rich experience in the field of Power Quality disturbances & its effects on Drives, PLCs and digitally controlled equipments. Our close association with Designers, Manufacturers & users of CNC machines, Computers and other Hi-tech Electronic equipment manufacturers have provided us with detailed insight into various aspects and intricacies of Power Quality.
